TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DesignSurfaceEventHandler(object sender, DesignSurfaceEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DesignSurfaceEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DesignSurfaceEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DesignSurfaceEventArgs)
public delegate void DesignSurfaceEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DesignSurfaceEventArgs ^ e);
type DesignSurfaceEventHandler = delegate of obj * DesignSurfaceEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: Objeto que contiene los datos del evento.

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: Representa el método que controlará el evento de una clase .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando creas un delegado, identifica un método para controlar el evento.When you create a delegate, you identify a method to handle the event. Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controlador de eventos, consulte [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
